fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Coerce an authorized target during the night.
- Coerce an unauthorized target during the night. 1 Use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Coerced targets will be roleblocked **if** they aren't a Sentry.
- You will not be notified whether you roleblocked your target.
- Roleblock Immunity.
